block.arcanelanterns.boreal_lantern.desc: Slows nearby mobs and players down, also extinguishes burning mobs.
block.arcanelanterns.brilliant_lantern.d: Turns nearby animals directly into experience.
block.arcanelanterns.cloud_lantern.descr: Applies the slow fall effect in the surrounding area.
Keeps all living entities except the player confined to an area.
block.arcanelanterns.feral_lantern.descr: Lights up a giant area around it by spawning temporary sparks, will stop eventually.
block.arcanelanterns.lantern_maker.descr: To imbue a lantern the lantern maker will require a number of catalysts. Finally, place a lantern block on top to fuse everything together.
block.arcanelanterns.life_lantern.descri: Makes crops around the lantern grow faster.
block.arcanelanterns.love_lantern.descri: Makes nearby mobs fall in love.
block.arcanelanterns.wailing_lantern.des: Cries if you get close, screams and applies nausea if you get even closer.
block.arcanelanterns.warding_lantern.des: Pushes all living entities except players away.
block.arcanelanterns.withering_lantern.d: Applies the wither effect in the surrounding area.
